name: All Roads Lead To One
description:
For the GMTK game jam I was thinking about what could be made with only one goal. The same goal for all players, a goal that never changes.

The goal I decided on was to travel in the real world to get as close as you can to the center of the Roman world. If you get close enough you will win, but maybe just getting closer than you started will be enough.

Not everyone, in fact very few people, will ever be able to win this game, but you can at least share the one goal for a time.
